IBM Operational Statistics

IBM Patents

How many patents is IBM granted in a year?

IBM was granted 4,389 patents in 2022, down from 8,682 in 2021. [ 2 ]

Date: Jan 14, 2023

IBM received more patents than any other US company for 29 years straight since 1993 before having its streak broken by Samsung in 2022. [ 2 ]

Date: Jan 14, 2023
